newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romania rollover T-bill issue oversubscribed.
newsitem.headline: Romania rollover T-bill issue oversubscribed.

text.p: An issue of 300.16 billion lei in Romanian 98-days treasury bills was slightly oversubscribed on Thursday with banks' bids exceeding by 20 million lei the Finance Ministry offer, according to central bank (BNR) data.
The bills maturing on May 8 offer an annual yield calculated at the average on the BNR's weekly auctioned credits rates during their life period.
On Thursday, the BNR lifted its one-week rate to 80 percent from 70 percent.
Traders said the money market was dried of leu funds. Most banks were chasing leu funds to meet their reserve targets.
